briefdescription.para: This method initializes the configData for eulerRotation model. It creates the module output message.

parameterdescription.para: The configuration data associated with the null space control
The ID associated with the configData

briefdescription.para: This resets the module to original states.

parameterdescription.para: The configuration data associated with the null space control
The clock time at which the function was called (nanoseconds)
The ID associated with the configData

briefdescription.para: This method takes the input attitude reference frame, and and superimposes the dynamic euler angle scanning motion on top of this.

parameterdescription.para: The configuration data associated with the mrpRotation module
The clock time at which the function was called (nanoseconds)
The ID associated with the configData

briefdescription.para: This function checks if there is a new commanded raster maneuver message available.

parameterdescription.para: The configuration data associated with the mrpRotation module

briefdescription.para: This function computes control update time.

parameterdescription.para: The configuration data associated with the mrpRotation module
The clock time at which the function was called (nanoseconds)

briefdescription.para: This function computes the analytical derivative of the B_inv matrix for the 3-2-1 Euler Angle set.

parameterdescription.para: the inv(B) matrix for 321 Euler angles

memberdef.argsstring: (eulerRotationConfig *configData, double sigma_R0N[3], double omega_R0N_N[3], double domega_R0N_N[3], AttRefMsgPayload *attRefOut)
memberdef.name: computeEulerRotationReference

briefdescription.para: This function computes the reference (Euler angle attitude set, angular velocity and angular acceleration) associated with a rotation defined in terms of an initial euler angle set and a constant euler angle rate.

parameterdescription.para: The configuration data associated with the mrpRotation module
The input reference attitude using MRPs
The input reference frame angular rate vector
The input reference frame angular acceleration vector

inbodydescription.para: < [] DCM rotating from R0 to R
< [] DCM rotating from N to R0
< [] DCM rotating from N to R
< [] matrix related Euler angle rates to angular velocity vector components
< [r/s] angular velocity vector between R and R0 frame in R frame components
< [r/s] angular velocity vector between R and R0 frame in N frame components
< [] time derivatie of matrix relating EA rates to omegas
< [r/s] inertial derivative of omega_RR0_R in R frame components
< [r/s] inertial derivative of omega_RR0_R in N frame components
